summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code; amending Section 11.58.420 of the Seattle Municipal Code adding an exemption to the open liquor containier law; amending Section 11.31.050 extending time within which to respond to traffic infractions, amending Section 11.56.120 relating to reckless driving, amending Section 11.34.020 General Penalties to conform the penalty to State Law, amending Chapter 11.58 making it an infraction to incorrectly label or store alcoholic beverages, and repealing Section 11.56.130 reckless - racing.
